title: Red Hat denies second set of sex discrimination, wrongful termination allegations
text:
Red Hat denies second set of sex discrimination, wrongful termination allegations More

Red Hat is denying wrongdoing related to a second set of sex discrimination allegations lobbed by a former employee. Danielle Malecek is one of at least two former Red Hatters to file similar complaints in recent months – and Red Hat has flatly denied wrongdoing in court filings for both cases – including an answer filed Friday. Malecek, formerly of Durham-based Ansible, part of Red Hat’s umbrella, filed suit against Red Hat in June, claiming “negative treatment because of her gender,” including the reassignment of lucrative client accounts to male counterparts.
